NAME, IFNULL(tb1.day_complete_time, 0) day_complete_time, IFNULL(tb2.day_accept_time, 0) day_accept_time, IFNULL(tb3.month_complete_time, 0) month_complete_time, IFNULL(tb4.accumulated_complete_time,0) accumulated_complete_time FROM delivery_user ud LEFT JOIN ( select o.allot_delivery_id, count(o.order_id) day_complete_time from order_info o where DATE_FORMAT(o.delivery_complete_time,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m%d') and o.order_status='60' GROUP BY o.allot_delivery_id ) tb1 ON ud.id = tb1.allot_delivery_id LEFT JOIN ( select o.allot_delivery_id, count(o.order_id) day_accept_time from order_info o where DATE_FORMAT(o.delivery_order_time,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m%d') and o.order_status='40' GROUP BY o.allot_delivery_id ) tb2 ON ud.id = tb2.allot_delivery_id LEFT JOIN ( select o.allot_delivery_id, count(o.order_id) month_complete_time from order_info o where DATE_FORMAT(o.delivery_complete_time,'%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m') GROUP BY o.allot_delivery_id ) tb3 ON ud.id = tb3.allot_delivery_id LEFT JOIN ( select o.allot_delivery_id, count(o.order_id) accumulated_complete_time from order_info o where o.order_status='60' GROUP BY o.allot_delivery_id ) tb4 ON ud.id = tb4.allot_delivery_id
